text: "The Actor" is a 1991 song by Danish band Michael Learns to Rock. It was taken from their debut studio album Michael Learns to Rock. It went to number 1 in Norway and Indonesia, number 32 in Switzerland, number 7 in Norway and number 4 in Denmark. ==Track listings== Standard # "The Actor" – 4:35 # "African Queen" – 4:11 Dutch maxi-CD single # "The Actor" – 4:35 # "Gone After Midnight" – 4:12 # "African Queen" – 4:11 ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:Michael Learns To Rock songs
title: The Actor (Michael Learns to Rock song)
